mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(b.id), b.bucket_name as bucketName, b.start_date as startDate, b.end_date as endDate, b.bucket_state as bucketState FROM bucket b JOIN bucket_tag bt ON b.id = bt.bucket_id JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id WHERE (b.bucket_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR t.tag_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")) AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT id as userId, nickname, intro FROM user WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") ABD id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE id = #{userId})

SELECT b.id as bucketId, u.id as userId, b.bucket_name as bucketName, b.bucket_state as bucketState, b.end_date as endDate, u.profile_url as userProfileUrl FROM bucket b JOIN bucket_tag bt ON b.id = bt.bucket_id JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id JOIN bookmark bm ON bm.bucket_id = b.id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE (b.bucket_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR c.category_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")) AND u.id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE id = #{userId})
